titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1319) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of S. Con. Res. 5.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1319) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of S. Con. Res. 5.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 166.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-8, by Mr. McGovern.
The resolution provides that the amendment printed in the Rules Committee report shall be considered as adopted and the bill, as amended, shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 7.

action.text: On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 205 (Roll no. 46).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 210 (Roll no. 47).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 1319 (American Rescue Plan Act of 2021).
(H.R. 1319 provides for reconciliation pursuant to title II of S.Con.Res. 5 that directs several House and Senate committees to submit changes in laws within their jurisdictions that will increase the deficit over FY2021-FY2030 by no more than an amount specified for each committee.)
